definition: A legal document or permit issued by the appropriate authority, granting authorization for the construction, alteration, or renovation of a building or structure. It is typically required before commencing any construction project and ensures compliance with building codes, safety regulations, and zoning laws.

examples.english: The building permit has been granted.

examples.german: Ohne Baugenehmigung darf hier nicht gebaut werden.
examples.english: Building is not allowed here without a building permit.

examples.german: Die Baugenehmigung ist für ein Jahr gültig.
examples.english: The building permit is valid for one year.

examples.german: Die Baugenehmigung wurde aufgrund fehlender Unterlagen abgelehnt.
examples.english: The building permit was rejected due to missing documents.

examples.german: Die Baugenehmigung kann online beantragt werden.
examples.english: The building permit can be applied for online.
